item.title: TikTok is adding features for songwriters to its app
item.description: TikTok is adding a new label to its app, allowing songwriters to highlight their profiles

item.title: Jack Dorsey pumps $10 million into a nonprofit focused on open-source social media
item.description: Jack Dorsey backs nonprofit 'and Other Stuff' with $10M to build open social technology.

item.title: Apple News+ adds a new game that uses emoji and Genmoji to sovle puzzles
item.description: Released to coincide with World Emoji Day, the new Emoji Game is part logic, part word game that's inspired by how we use emojis to communicate.

item.title: Beeper’s all-in-one messaging app relaunches with an on-device model and premium upgrades
item.description: Multi-service messaging app Beeper, which allows people to connect to all their chat apps from one interface, is relaunching its app on Wednesday to o...

item.title: India eyes global quantum computer push — and QpiAI is its chosen vehicle
